trans-unit.source: Converts a scroll bar visibility and scroll position to <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Konverterer en rullefeltet synlighet og rullefeltet posisjonen til <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel> provide horizontal scrolling behavior for the ribbon.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel>og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel>Angi vannrette rullende virkemåte for båndet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel>

trans-unit.source: When scrolling is needed, the ribbon replaces the typical scroll bar with a repeat button at each end of the ribbon.
trans-unit.target: Når rulling er nødvendig, erstatter båndet vanlige rullefeltet med Gjenta-knappen på slutten av båndet.

trans-unit.source: This converter uses the visibility and position of the scroll bar to determine the visibility of each of the repeat buttons.
trans-unit.target: Denne konverteringsprogram bruker synlighet og Plasser på rullefeltet for å bestemme synligheten for hver av Gjenta knappene.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonScrollButtonVisibilityConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonScrollButtonVisibilityConverter"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Converts a scroll bar visibility and scroll position to a <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Konverterer en rullefeltet synlighet og rullefeltet posisjon til en <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility"> </xref> verdi.

trans-unit.source: The three <xref:System.Double> values that represent the scroll bar position are the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel.HorizontalOffset%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel.ExtentWidth%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel.ViewportWidth%2A> property values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Tre <xref:System.Double>verdier som representerer rullefeltet for plasseringen av <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel.HorizontalOffset%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel.ExtentWidth%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel.ViewportWidth%2A>egenskapsverdier på <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel>eller <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel.ViewportWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel.ExtentWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: These properties contain values from the panel’s internal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>.
trans-unit.target: Disse egenskapene inneholder verdier fra panelets intern <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: The `parameter` value represents the desired percentage that the ribbon is scrolled to the right before the scroll button is hidden.
trans-unit.target: Den `parameter` verdien representerer ønsket prosentverdi som båndet er rullet til høyre før rullefeltknappen er skjult.

trans-unit.source: By default, the left scroll button passes 0 as the parameter, and it is hidden when the ribbon is scrolled 0 percent to the right.
trans-unit.target: Som standard, venstre rullefeltknappen sender 0 som parameteren, og det er skjult når båndet er rullet 0 prosent til høyre.

trans-unit.source: The right scroll button passes 100 as the parameter, and it is hidden when the ribbon is scrolled 100 percent to the right.
trans-unit.target: Høyre rullefeltknappen sender 100 som parameteren, og det er skjult når båndet er rullet 100 prosent til høyre.

trans-unit.source: Passing in `null` or parameters of unexpected types may cause this method to return <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue>.
trans-unit.target: I `null` eller parameterne for uventet typer kan føre til at denne metoden til å returnere <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue>.</xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue>

trans-unit.source: The values to be converted.
trans-unit.target: Verdiene som skal konverteres.

trans-unit.source: Four values are expected, one <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility"></xref> object that represents scroll bar visibility and three <xref:System.Double> values that represent the scroll bar position.
trans-unit.target: Fire verdier forventes, én <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility"> </xref> objektet som representerer rullefeltet for synlighet og tre <xref:System.Double>verdier som representerer rullefeltet for posisjonen.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The type to be converted to.
trans-unit.target: Typen som skal konverteres til.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility"></xref> type is expected.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility"> </xref> type forventes.

trans-unit.source: The desired percentage that the ribbon is scrolled to the right before the scroll button is hidden.
trans-unit.target: Den ønskede prosenten båndet rullet til høyre før rullefeltknappen er skjult.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> is expected.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Double>forventes.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The culture to use when converting.
trans-unit.target: Kulturen som skal brukes ved konvertering.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility"></xref> object representing the visibility of the scroll button.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility"> </xref> -objekt som representerer synligheten for rullefeltknappen.

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: Er ikke implementert for denne APIen.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.DoNothing?displayProperty=fullName> is returned to indicate that the binding should use the fallback or default value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.DoNothing?displayProperty=fullName>returneres til å angi at bindingen skal bruke verdien basis eller standard.</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.DoNothing?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: Er ikke implementert for denne APIen.

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: Er ikke implementert for denne APIen.

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: Er ikke implementert for denne APIen.

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: Er ikke implementert for denne APIen.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding.DoNothing"></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding.DoNothing"></xref>i alle tilfeller.
